name: interpreaction
description: interPreaction (Preact build of interReaction) is a library which enables you to easily use React components in a non-React client application, while keeping React library and project build concerns separate from your non-React client application

engines-comments.node: using nvm to install and manage node versions (most recent stable) (https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm): $ nvm  install --lts
engines-comments.npm: using nvm to install and manage npm versions (most recent stable) (https://github.com/nvm-sh/nvm): $ nvm install-latest-npm

scripts.build:dev: pnpm run clean:build:dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=interpreaction ENVIRON=dev webpack --progress --color --config ./config/webpack/webpack-dev.config.js
scripts.build:prod: pnpm run clean:build:prod && cross-env NODE_ENV=production WORKSPACE=interpreaction ENVIRON=prod webpack --progress --color --config ./config/webpack/webpack-prod.config.js
scripts.build:prod-dev: pnpm run clean:build:prod-dev && cross-env NODE_ENV=development WORKSPACE=interpreaction ENVIRON=prod-dev webpack --progress --color --config ./config/webpack/webpack-prod-dev.config.js
scripts.build:release: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run build:dev && pnpm run build:prod && node ./task/makeReleaseDist.js
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run clean:dependencies
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean:build && pnpm run clean:dependencies
scripts.clean:dependencies: rimraf npm-debug.log && rimraf .pnpm-debug.log && rimraf pnpm-debug.log && rimraf node_modules
